selections.name: Moonwalk
selections.reason: Resuming class runner who placed in Group 3 company last campaign. Won a recent trial and has superior form lines to this field.

selections.name: Moonshine Queen
selections.reason: First-up winner previously and comes here off a trial win. Drawn well in barrier 2 to get a soft run.

selections.name: Miss Finkmeyer
selections.reason: Consistent filly who won her maiden two starts back and followed up with a solid 3rd in Class 3 company. Race fit.

selections.name: Chama
selections.reason: Resuming after winning debut in September. Trialled recently and has ability, though barrier 8 is a slight negative.

danger_horse.name: Moonshine Queen
danger_horse.reason: Undefeated fresh and trialled well; major threat if the top pick needs the run.

selections.name: Bradbury's Moment
selections.reason: Knocking on the door with a narrow 2nd last start. Despite the wide gate, brings the strongest recent form ratings.

selections.name: Vampi Queen
selections.reason: Lightly raced improver who finished a close 2nd last start. Steps up in trip which should suit.

selections.name: The Rocket
selections.reason: Consistent performer with recent placings. Has to overcome a wide draw but has the ability to figure.

selections.name: Back To Bondi
selections.reason: Solid debut effort finishing 3rd. Will take natural improvement and drawn to get a nice run.

danger_horse.name: Vampi Queen
danger_horse.reason: Rapid improver who could easily turn the tables with a better run in transit.

selections.name: Pariah's Thanks
selections.reason: Broke maiden status last start with a strong win. Drawn the rails and maps to get the perfect run.

selections.name: Cannykev
selections.reason: Consistent type who rarely runs a bad race. Won his maiden three starts back and has placed since.

selections.name: Espresso Time
selections.reason: Resuming off a trial win. Placed on debut last prep and looks ready to fire fresh.

selections.name: Setagaya
selections.reason: Better than recent form suggests. Drops in grade/depth here and can improve.

danger_horse.name: Cannykev
danger_horse.reason: Reliable benchmark performer who will capitalize if the favorite falters.

selections.name: Barney Rommel
selections.reason: Coming off a maiden win and has shown good progression. Looks capable of handling the step up to Class 1.

selections.name: Space Academy
selections.reason: Just missed last start when 2nd. Maps well from barrier 5 and is a major player.

selections.name: Jackpot Bingo
selections.reason: Last start winner who found the line well. Confidence is up and draws a decent gate.

selections.name: Rising Fame
selections.reason: Consistent mare who won her maiden two starts back. Drawn softly and should be in the finish.

danger_horse.name: Space Academy
danger_horse.reason: Narrowly beaten last time and meets a similar field.

selections.name: Oisin
selections.reason: Defeated the main danger (Azabelle) last start and meets her better at the weights after claims/penalties. Ideally drawn.

selections.name: Azabelle
selections.reason: Consistent mare who ran 2nd to Oisin last time. Will be right there again but weight swing favors the top pick.

selections.name: Mistress Of War
selections.reason: Last start winner in Class 1. Steps up in grade but is in winning form and draws well.

selections.name: Annie Warbucks
selections.reason: Runner-up last start and has been consistent. Place chance again.

danger_horse.name: Azabelle
danger_horse.reason: The clear threat to the top pick based on their last meeting.
